original_text: Now leave Babylon as free people! No longer serve the Babylonians! Shout the news with joy! Tell everyone about it, all over the world. Tell them that the Lord has redeemed his people, his servants, the Israelites. Now leave Babylon as free people! No longer serve the Babylonians! Shout the news with joy! Tell everyone about it, all over the world. Tell them that the Lord has redeemed his people, his servants, the Israelites. Now leave Babylon as free people! No longer serve the Babylonians! Shout the news with joy! Tell everyone about it, all over the world. Tell them that the Lord has redeemed his people, his servants, the Israelites. Now leave Babylon as free people! No longer serve the Babylonians! Shout the news with joy! Tell everyone about it, all over the world. Tell them that the Lord has redeemed his people, his servants, the Israelites. Now leave Babylon as free people!
korean_text: 너희는 바벨론에서 나와서 갈대아인을 피하고 즐거운 소리로 이를 알게 하여 들려 주며 땅 끝까지 반포하여 이르기를 여호와께서 그의 종 야곱을 구속하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: Now leave Babylon as free people!
No longer serve the Babylonians!
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 바빌론 사람들을 섬기지 말라!

sentences.original_text: Shout the news with joy!
Tell everyone about it, all over the world.
Tell them that the Lord has redeemed his people,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그의 백성을 구속하셨다고 그들에게 말하라.

sentences.original_text: his servants, the Israelites.
